item.description:
Film time is 7:15, I will be at the theater at 6:15, we will head in for seats at 6:45.

The movie is showing upstairs.   I will grab a table by the windows at the top of the escalators by the window.  If you get there before me, please snag a table.  I will be wearing a meetup pin and have a meetup sign.

Be aware that I usually do a meetup on opening weekend of a movie.   It is often a good idea to buy a ticket in advance, especially if there is a lot of buzz about it.  

If you miss the group before the movie, we will gather outside the room where the movie was just shown to discuss the film a bit, allow for restroom breaks and get a head count of those who are interested in going to a nearby establishment for refreshments and lively conversation.

Movie Details:

Release Date: February 25, 2011
Studio: New Line Cinema (Warner Bros.)
Director: Bobby Farrelly, Peter Farrelly
Screenwriter: Bobby Farrelly, Peter Farrelly, Pete Jones, Kevin Barnett
Starring: Owen Wilson, Jason Sudeikis, Jenna Fischer, Richard Jenkins, Christina Applegate, Alexandra Daddario, Stephen Merchant, Nicky Whelan, Larry Joe Campbell, Tyler Hoechlin
Genre: Comedy 

Official Website:

http://hallpassmovie.warnerbros.com/

Movie Poster: View here

Plot Summary: Rick (Owen Wilson) and Fred (Jason Sudeikis) are best friends who have a lot in common, including the fact that they have each been married for many years. But when the two men begin to show signs of restlessness at home, their wives (Jenna Fischer, Christina Applegate) take a bold approach to revitalizing their marriages: granting them a "hall pass," one week of freedom to do whatever they want...no questions asked. At first, it sounds like a dream come true for Rick and Fred. But it isn't long before they discover that their expectations of the single life--and themselves--are completely, and hilariously, out of sync with reality.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a meetup pin and have a meetup sign. If movie is upstairs I will grab a table by the windows at the top of the escalators, if downstairs I will be by the ropes near the concession stand till they let us line up inside.
item.why: It will be fun to see a silly comedy and then go out for drinks and munchies on a cold winter night. Can you believe it? It isn't in 3D!
item.name: Hall Pass
